mapper.select: SELECT b.seq xcodeGroupSeq , b.name xcodeGroupName , a.delNy , a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime FROM commoncode a LEFT JOIN commongroup b ON b.seq = a.commonGroup_seq WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY b.seq, a.seq

SELECT b.seq xcodeGroupSeq , b.name xcodeGroupName , a.delNy , a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime FROM commoncode a LEFT JOIN commongroup b ON b.seq = a.commonGroup_seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.seq = #{seq}

SELECT b.seq xcodeGroupSeq , b.name xcodeGroupName , a.delNy , a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime FROM commoncode a LEFT JOIN commongroup b ON b.seq = a.commonGroup_seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commoncode ( name , regDateTime , modDateTime , delNy , commonGroup_seq ) VALUES ( #{name} , now() , now() , 0 , #{xcodeGroupSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE commoncode SET modDateTime = now() , delNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND seq = #{seq}
UPDATE commoncode SET modDateTime = now() , delNy = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND seq = #{seq}
